name: Twin-Down
overview: Head to head Tetris style game published in Game On 1992/06. Try to form a row of 3 identical blocks horizontally, vertically or diagonally. When done the involved blocks will disappear. Your game is over when the blocks reach the top of the screen. In case of emergency you have 3 Jokers available. All blocks of the same kind the Joker touches first will disappear.
